title: Even Though She Is a Girl of Love Level 0, She’s Stuck Being Asked To Kiss Him - Novel Updates
tags: Curses   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Magic
author: Takami Hina   高見雛
description: Doris has become a recluse because of a curse placed on her by a witch. One day, the curse goes out of control and turns the princess into a cat! The only way to break the curse is to kiss the person she loves - but it seems that Doris will die if she meets the wrong person. Doris, who has never been in love before, asks her childhood friend, the crown prince, to give her some pointers on love. 'You should be aware that you are cute,' says His Highness, suddenly hugging her!>
